PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-04282013-04-25,  ,  ,  ,  HRSDC, 
ActDepartment of Human Resources and Skills Development Act
Employment Insurance Act
SubjectSocial Insurance Number Regulations
PrecisSOCIAL INSURANCE NUMBER REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that the regulatory provisions related to Social Insurance Number/Social Insurance Register are consistent with the new legislative authority by transferring these provisions from the Employment Insurance Regulations to new regulations under the Department of Human Resources and Skills Development Act; and (2) resolve discrepancies between the legislative and regulatory requirements related to Social Insurance Numbers by removing certain references to a Social Insurance Number card and by making the issuance of a Social Insurance Number card discretionary rather than mandatory.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0082 Publication Date: 2013-05-08
AttachmentsAttachment
